title: An illustrated handbook of Indian arms : being a classified and descriptive catalogue of the arms exhibited at the India Museum : with an introductory sketch of the military history of India
dimensions: vii, 162 pages : illustrations (part folded, part color), colored map ; Height: 11 in. (28 cm)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. Edward C. Moore Collection, Bequest of Edward C. Moore, 1891
